attributes.action: Create an English Assembly - much the same as the Scots Assembly and the Welsh Parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Disallow all Irish, Welsh and Scots from standing in our English Assembly. Give us the right to choose whether WE charge for university places (as in Scotland). Let US English choose how much we pay our pensioners. Give us back our Country where we have the right to make our own rules without intervention of the other member states of the United Kingdom.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
